title: For Trade:  1895 N300 Mayo Robinson PSA 1
author: aro13

posts.post_title: For Trade:  1895 N300 Mayo Robinson PSA 1
posts.post_content:
I have a PSA 1 Mayo Wilbert Robinson card that I am looking to trade.

I am looking for a similar card from the Mayo set of either - Clarkson, Hamilton, Delahanty, Nichols or Rusie in trade.


I won this Robinson from a Sloate auction years ago and had it graded by PSA.  Card has a pinhole in the top center which accounts for the grade.

[IMG]http://i123.photobucket.com/albums/o286/aro67/img400.jpg[/IMG]
